Title: Directs a study on the feasibility of adjusting the compulsory attendance age of minors attending full time instruction
Summary: Directs a study on the feasibility of adjusting the compulsory attendance age of minors attending full time instruction; requires report and recommendations on or before July 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT directing a study on the feasibility of adjusting the compulsory attendance age of minors attending full time instruction; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
